@Phong6698 Thank you for submitting this PR! I see this is your first time submitting to DefinitelyTyped 👋 — I'm the local bot who will help you through the process of getting things through.

***This is a live comment which I will keep updated.***

This PR touches some part of DefinitelyTyped infrastructure, so a DT maintainer will need to review it. This is rare — did you mean to do this?

## 1 package in this PR

* `vertx__eventbus-bridge-client.js` (*new!*) — [on npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@vertx/eventbus-bridge-client.js), [on unpkg](https://unpkg.com/browse/@vertx/eventbus-bridge-client.js@latest/)

## Code Reviews

This PR adds a new definition, so it needs to be reviewed by a DT maintainer before it can be merged.

## Status

 * ✅ No merge conflicts
 * 🔐 Continuous integration tests waiting for a maintainer to authorize a run
 * 🕐 Only a DT maintainer can approve changes when there are new packages added

Once every item on this list is checked, I'll ask you for permission to merge and publish the changes.
